metadata.description:
This snuggin' rare variation of the DRx Kill Team Halloween T-shirt features an ominous "Night M'rare" texture flashing across the shirt. This mind-altering wearable also features DRx-perience augmented reality (AR) animation and is designed to be interoperable across multiple avatar collections.

Find more undissolved Kill Team Halloween Capsules: https://opensea.io/collection/drx-kill-team-capsule

See the original Drug Receipts Genesis Collection: https://opensea.io/collection/drugreceipts

Find Drug Receipts apparel and more at the Drug Store: https://drx.store
